definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: She nursed her husband back to health.
sentences.chinese: 她精心照料丈夫，直到他康复。

sentences.english: With the nurse's careful attendance, the patient finally recovered.
sentences.chinese: 经过护士的悉心照料，那个病人终于恢复了健康。

sentences.english: So his two biggest fans are taken care of.
sentences.chinese: 因此他的两个最大的粉丝得到了悉心照料。

sentences.english: He's good at caring for sick animals.
sentences.chinese: 他精心照料生病的牲畜。

sentences.english: Become a glance of team cooperation.
Our mind and bodies need to be taken care of.
sentences.chinese: 我们身心都需要悉心照料。

sentences.english: While the mother was abroad, the baby was dealt fairly well by the babysitter.
sentences.chinese: 当妈妈出国时，孩子得到了保姆的精心照料。

sentences.english: However, as a trumpeter father and son are taken care of, he has to wake up.
sentences.chinese: 不过经吹鼓手父子的悉心照料，他已经醒过来。

sentences.english: He nursed the house plants through a long winter.
sentences.chinese: 在漫长的冬季他一直精心照料室内盆栽植物。

sentences.english: One glance of recognition, she had imagined, must needs pass between them.
sentences.chinese: 他俩之问需要交换一次彼此心照的眼色。

sentences.english: Now it goes without saying that we all know what virginity is.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们都心照不宣，知道什么是童贞。

sentences.english: Skin is the largest organ in the body, so it's certainly worthwhile taking care of.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤是人体最大的器官，所以它当然值得你精心照料。

sentences.english: February red body issues, have been at his side taken care of.
sentences.chinese: 二月红身体抱恙，莫测一直在他身边悉心照料着。

sentences.english: The blond groom poured Lucy a glass of wine and smiled knowingly.
sentences.chinese: 金发新郞给露西倒了一杯葡萄酒，心照不宣地微笑着。

sentences.english: Please ask the sun to set her heart aglow .
sentences.chinese: 请让太阳将她的心照得明亮。

sentences.english: He owes it to his doctor's care that he's quite well again.
sentences.chinese: 多亏了他医生的悉心照料，他身体又好起来了。
